extendedInfo.description: Rick Santorum is not currently part of the campaign. But, this is still a great way to get the know how on Rick Santorum. ____________________________________________________________you support Rick Santorum, but donât enjoy spending all of your time visiting too many websites to find out his latest updates? Then this app is for you. Featuring his most recent news, tweets, facebook posts, and more, itâs one of the best things any true patriot or conservative will find. THIS APP IS NOT ENDORSED OR APPROVED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATES COMMITTEE.

reviews.title: One Stop Shopping on everything Santorum!
reviews.comment: Great source to find all the current information and activities for Mr. Santorum.   Well designed and easy to navigate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent source of news!
reviews.comment: This app is great for people who want to know what\'s happening. It is a promising start-up application as this is the developer\'s first app. I have thoroughly tested the application for bugs and I found none.  This app is by far worth more than you pay. This is the perfect app for people who need to keep up with the news on Rick Santorum!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for Rick Santorum news
reviews.comment: Helps me keep track of Rick
reviews.author: A Google User
